summary: Successfully tested 'Guess It' and 'Remove' buttons in chat match cards - all functionality working correctly with proper backend integration
passed_tests: Backend health check returns healthy status (GET /api/health)
User registration and login functionality working (POST /api/auth/register, POST /api/auth/login)
Exact score prediction deletion API working (DELETE /api/predictions/exact-score/match/{match_id})
Messages page loads with proper authentication redirect
Action buttons container exists with data-testid='chat-card-action-buttons'
Guess It button visible in main area with data-testid='chat-guess-it-btn'
Remove button visible in main area with data-testid='chat-remove-btn'
Buttons positioned in main visible area, NOT inside Advanced section
Button state management works correctly (enabled/disabled based on vote selection)
Guess It button successfully calls backend prediction API
Frontend compiles and runs without errors
WebSocket connections established for chat, notifications, and friends
